page.title: 12LAW AND ORDER
page.content:
Haddington has a{Police Station,}a {Sherriff Court, District Court.
The{District Court}deals with minor crimes and traffic offences, eg drunk driving. The{Sherriff Court}deals with more serious offences and crimes along with serious road traffic accidents. The Police Station's catchment area includes Pencaitland, Gifford, Garvald, Haddington, Athelstaneford, Gladsmuir and down to Pencraig on the A1. The station is manned by 20 men.
Haddington's{crime rate}was approximately{1000 crimes}last year, with about a 30% solvency rate. Of this 30% only the more serious crimes go to the{High Court in Edinburgh.
